chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Gabber is a complete Gnome Jabber client. This document describes version 0.8.7 of Gabber. More information about the authors of Gabber and a link to Gabber's web site can be found in .
To run Gabber, select Gabber from the Internet sub-menu of the Main Menu, or type gabber from the command line.

sect1.title: Jabber
sect1.para: Jabber is an extensible, Open Source Instant Messaging (IM) system that provides advanced IM features in a completely distributed environment.
The complete Jabber protocol specification is available to anyone at Jabber.org.
